alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:58AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Albany and west central Laramie Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1157 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Laramie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laramie, Iron Mountain and Baldy Peak. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 306 and 311. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
